description: This file contains unit tests for the TodoistTools class, testing its initialization, task creation, retrieval, updating, closing, deletion, and error handling, using mocking and patching techniques.

methods.name: mock_todoist_api
methods.description: Creates a mock Todoist API client for testing.

methods.name: todoist_tools
methods.description: Creates a TodoistTools instance with a mocked API for testing.

methods.name: test_init_with_api_token
methods.description: Tests initialization of TodoistTools with an API token provided via environment.

methods.name: test_init_with_env_var
methods.description: Tests initialization of TodoistTools with an API token from environment variable.

methods.name: test_init_without_token
methods.description: Tests that initialization fails if no API token is provided.

methods.name: test_init_with_selective_tools
methods.description: Tests initialization with specific tool options enabled or disabled.

methods.name: test_create_task_success
methods.description: Tests successful creation of a task with various parameters.

methods.name: test_get_task_success
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval of a task by ID.

methods.name: test_update_task_success
methods.description: Tests successful update of a task.

methods.name: test_close_task_success
methods.description: Tests successful closing (completing) of a task.

methods.name: test_delete_task_success
methods.description: Tests successful deletion of a task.

methods.name: test_error_handling
methods.description: Tests error handling in various API interactions.

methods.name: test_create_task_with_due_date
methods.description: Tests creating a task with a due date.

methods.name: test_create_task_with_labels
methods.description: Tests creating a task with labels.
